flawed_nl_solution:
After going on vacation, Grandpa has 100 * 36 = <<100*36=3600>>3600 tomatoes.
So in his absence, 3600 - 36 = <<3600-36=3546>>3546 tomatoes have grown.
#### 3546

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3564, not 3546. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
